text: First time I've tried this place and very disappointed! Food is terrible the miso soup tasted nothing. Basically it's just water and added a small cube of tofu not even a salt and pepper in there. Everything taste awful the fish taste like from 3 days ago.   Lots of sushi place around.. this place is waste of money.  So, I give 0 star.

We were so excited when this little sushi shop opened just two blocks from our place. However, our excitement quickly waned after the first couple of times we tried it out. There are so many sushi restaurants in Montreal but unfortunately the competition has not improved the quality. The seaweed salad tasted a little off. The tempura was just plain terrible, almost uneatable. Since it is on our way home from the subway, we might come here again out of convenience (it is still a step above the supermarket sushi), but we will not be excited about our dinner.

Je suis allé la avec une amie, complètement par hasard. C'est une toute petite place, quelques table. Mais les sushis qu'on a commandé étaient franchement excellents!   Spécialement les Rainbow, Tartare de saumon, et Montréal. Vraiment excellent, on a pris des menus en partant, pour pouvoir s'en faire livrer.
Qualité en grande baisse, à se demander si le poisson est toujours frais. Trop de doutes ces derniers temps, fin des tests pour moi...
